title: Africa Screams (Abbott & Costello , 1949) Adventure, Comedy | Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: Africa Screams (Abbott & Costello , 1949) Adventure, Comedy | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Two booksellers search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of cannibals.

Original title: Africa Screams (1949)

Director: Charles Barton
Writers: Earl Baldwin, Martin Ragaway, Leonard Stern
Stars: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Clyde Beatty, Hillary Brooke
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Adventure, Action

00:00 Full Movie
01:25  Stanley Livington is asked to draw a map from a book called 'Dark Safari' for $1,000.
06:15  A comedic conversation between two characters about a silly-looking guy and a business deal.
12:07  Stanley Livington, a self-proclaimed great hunter, meets Clyde Beatty and they discuss their experiences with taming lions.
22:03  Stanley is asked to draw a map but ends up drawing directions to a department store instead.
24:48  Stanley and Buzz get into various comedic mishaps while on an adventure in the jungle.
30:42: Buzz and Stanley encounter Frank Buck while setting traps in the jungle.
38:09  Stan and Ollie discuss diving into a river with crocodiles and impersonate animals.
43:49  Stanley gets trapped inside a lion's cage and is unable to escape, leading to his demise.
54:00  Stanley and Buzz find diamonds in the jungle.
1:06:22  A man finds diamonds in the jungle and tries to hide them from his companions.
1:09:52  A man named Stanley loses his diamonds and feels lost and alone.
